stocks.name: Chipotle
stocks.title: Chiptole Stock
stocks.bio: Chipotle stock has been doing well for years now and is one we highly recommend our clients look in to.
stocks.info: Chipotle is high right now so we do not recommend buying right now

stocks.name: American Airlines
stocks.title: American Airlines Stock
stocks.bio: All travel stocks have taken a hit due to the coronavirus.
stocks.info: Right now is a great time to buy since airlines are at an all time low

stocks.name: Carnival Cruise Line
stocks.title: Carnival Cruise Line Stock
stocks.bio: Cruise lines have also taken a huge hit due to the virus.
stocks.info: Their stocks are at all time lows since people are reluctant to travel great time to buy

stocks.name: Exxon
stocks.title: Exxon Stock
stocks.bio: Oil is at the lowest price it has been in years. There is more oil than people are using.
stocks.info: Due to the lack of need oil companies have lowered the price of their product and aren't making money on it.
